item.title: The Giver (DVD)
item.description:
Apparently Jeff Bridges.as been trying to have The Giver turned into a movie for the better part of two decades. Originally, he wanted to have Lloyd Bridges.n the eponymous role. He even apparently went so far as to have a version filmed somewhere, although so far as I know that version has never been made publically available.

I wonder if that one diverged so much from the book?
